name: Suspicious New-PSDrive to Admin Share
description: Adversaries may use to interact with a remote network share using Server Message Block (SMB). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*New\-PSDrive* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-psprovider\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*filesystem* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-root\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\\\\\* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*$*)`
